name: translate

scripts.build: rollup src/index.js -o translate.js --name translate --output.format umd && uglifyjs translate.js -o translate.min.js
scripts.gzip: gzip -c translate.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix
scripts.start: npm run watch # Start ~= Start dev
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "npm run build && npm test && npm run gzip" --watch src --watch test --watch webpack.config.js --watch package.json
